articles.description: Divers Yasmin Harper and Scarlett Mew Jensen win Team GB's first medal of the Paris 2024 Olympics with a dramatic bronze in the women's synchronised 3m springboard.
articles.title: Olympics diving: Yasmin Harper and Scarlett Mew Jensen win Team GB's first medal with diving bronze in Paris

articles.description: The 2024 Olympics opened in Paris in spectacular style with thousands of athletes sailing along the River Seine past lively performers on bridges, banks and rooftops in an ambitious take on an opening ceremony.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympic opening ceremony kicks off Games in unique style

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Find out the day-by-day schedule from the Paris Olympics 2024 for each sport and event including athletics, swimming, football, cycling and more
articles.title: Olympics Schedule - Paris 2024 day-by-day guide of events

articles.description: England host West Indies in the third Test at Edgbaston – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: Third Test, day two, Edgbaston– cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Each summer Premier League clubs fly around the world on their pre-season tours. BBC Sport looks at the numbers.
articles.title: Premier League pre-season: Which club flew the most this summer?

articles.description: Great Britain's Adam Peaty wins his 100m breaststroke heat and qualifies for the semi-finals at Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Olympic swimming: Adam Peaty through to 100m breaststroke semi-finals

articles.description: Hungarian midfielder Dominik Szoboszlai scores against Real Betis in Pittsburgh to give Arne Slot a first win in the post-Jurgen Klopp era.
articles.title: Liverpool: Dominik Szoboszlai scores in 1-0 win over Real Betis in Pittsburgh

articles.description: Great Britain start their bid for Olympic hockey gold with a commanding 4-0 win over Spain in Pool A.
articles.title: Olympic hockey: Great Britain men thrash Spain 4-0 in Paris 2024 opener
